OOC: Rodimus had elita with him when Blackstorm was being reprogramin.
 

Nightlight/Elita

Elita woke up and giggledat his daddy, Nighlight smiled when she saw 
the baby and she touch kindly her cheek while she said "Hello little 
one, where's you mommy?"

A tiny sound alerted her and said "What's that???" she looked where 
the noyse came and she could see a shadow (The caverman).

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> The Caveman, who had entered the ship, was now in the same room as

the sendors

kept his
